article: Dear Sammy , I ' m sorry I ca n ' t go to the Sports Center with you today . I have to see a doctor . Here are the directions to the Sports Center . From our house , go right ahead on Main Avenue . Walk past the police station and the City Fountain . Then cross the bridge . At the other side of the river , turn right . The Sports Center is on your left . You ca n ' t miss it . The basketball game starts at 1 : 00 p . m . so do n ' t be late . By the way , let ' s have some ice - cream after you finish playing . We can meet at Choco ' s Ice - Cream Shop . It ' s right around the corner from the Sports Center . Your game should be over at 3 : 00 p . m . so I ' ll meet you there 10 minutes later . Have fun ! Mom
questions: Where is Choco ' s Ice - Cream Shop ?

model: it ' s near the sports center .
it ' s on the corner of the sports center .
human: It ' s on the left of the police station .
It ' s near the Sports Center .
